description:
File Synchronisation for Cozy on Desktop and Laptop.

Cozy Drive for Desktop allows you to synchronize the files stored in your Cozy with your laptop and/or desktop computer.
It replicates your files on your hard drive and apply changes you made on them on other synced devices and on your online Cozy.
- :wrench: We've activated the partial synchronization feature by default.
  It can still
- :sparkles: Google Chrome's temporary download files will now be ignored by the local
- :bug: We'll now try to synchronize documents that were modified even after multiple
- :bug: Documents trashed or erased on the remote Cozy will now be erased on the local
- :wrench: We reverted our build machine Ubuntu version back to v20.04 as newer versions
